opinion: I did not like what I ordered
item was simply taken off the bill with a big apology
other times I have been there the food was excellent
I have never had a better pancake
I do wish they could serve them with a choice of oleo or real butter
one of the best most pleasant deals in town
The photo is the alley behind the building
The food is the best coffee shop food around
especially good any time of day or night
very reasonable for the amount you get
not looking for trendy upscale place just good food
Tiffiney Ericksen has worked their for 8 plus yrs
